data.title: Israeli Writer and Journalist Amnon Dankner Dies at 67
data.meta_description: During His Career, Dankner Wrote for Many of Israel's Daily Newspapers Including Haaretz, Davar, Hadashot and Maariv, of Which He Was Editor-in-chief From 2002 to 2007.
